install.name: jNews-Virtuemart Newsletter Subscription
install.author: Joobi Limited

install.description: This plugins handles the Mailing List subscription on Virtuemart Registration Page

param.name: reqfield
param.label: Required Field
param.description: This field should not be empty to susbcribe the user. You can use this parameter to add field (simple checkbox or radio button) on Virtuemart Registration Page

param.name: lists
param.label: jNews List IDs
param.description: You can specify the list IDs that your virtuemart users will subscribe to. If left blank, it will take all jNews lists
